result.eng: Well, the television is the problem then, unless you are spending too much time in the shower!

result.eng: You can drive to plenty of places in Connemara without spending more than an hour on the road.

result.eng: I need to close the door.

result.eng: It was really nice to spend a few weeks here, but I will be happy to be back home all the same.
result.ga: bhí sé fíordheas cúpla seachtain a chaitheamh anseo ach beidh mé sásta a bheith ar ais sa mbaile mar sin féin

result.eng: I have to get up early in the morning.

result.eng: I have to go, or I'll be late.

result.eng: Tuesdays I go out to throw darts.

result.eng: Do you throw darts every single night on Tuesdays?

result.eng: Do you get any exercise at all? I don't - except throwing darts.

result.eng: He had the courage to wear t-shirts that were so tight you'd worry his nipples would pierce them.

result.eng: "What's wrong with you?" called Norma-Jean when Rebekka chucked the bowl into the sink.

result.eng: The relaxed atmosphere of the Internet gives a platform to every sort of cantankerous git to give out to other people under the protection of anonymity.

result.eng: If only I was as young as you today. I'd spend my live differently.
